personal.name: Shraddha Namdeo
personal.title: Social Media Executive
personal.tagline: Crafting Digital Stories That Roam Wild

about.summary: Results-driven Social Media Executive with 3+ years of experience managing digital campaigns, content strategy, and brand engagement across LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube. Skilled in developing data-driven marketing plans, building strong influencer networks, and driving measurable audience growth. Passionate about crafting creative storytelling that aligns with organizational goals and enhances brand visibility.
highlights: 40% increase in engagement across all platforms
300% growth in organic reach for client brands

achievements: Managed and optimized brand presence across LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube, achieving a 40% increase in engagement and follower growth
Executed creative campaigns, giveaways, and hackathons, driving significant online traction and audience participation
Led influencer partnerships and collaborations, enhancing brand credibility within the tech and education domains
Hosted interactive LinkedIn Live sessions, Twitter Spaces, and in-house office events to foster brand-community relationships
Utilized analytics tools to monitor KPIs, evaluate campaign performance, and provide actionable marketing insights
Mentored interns, promoting a culture of creativity, teamwork, and content excellence
Collaborated with hiring managers to identify staffing needs and source qualified candidates
Supported placement assistance for students, improving candidate readiness and interview performance
Conducted screening calls and initial assessments to streamline the recruitment process
Led a 2-member team to execute 20+ paid social media campaigns, achieving substantial increases in lead generation
Implemented creative marketing strategies to enhance audience engagement and brand reach
Contributed to content design and execution of promotional visuals, improving campaign ROI and conversion
Created engaging digital content across Instagram and Facebook, leading to a 300% growth in engagement
Directed photoshoots and cinematography for creative campaigns to enhance product storytelling
Executed data-driven content research to optimize visual and messaging strategies
Supervised admissions, student records, and staff coordination for 450+ students, ensuring efficient operations
Led and motivated a team of 10 teachers and staff to improve productivity and learning outcomes
